name: I am Piyush Bangar
description: I am piyush bangar. Machine Learning is my major subject of interest. I have worked on 2 machine learning projects with python in which i have worked with different models including LSTM and Deep Neural Net.

projects.title: STOCK MARKET PREDICTION:
projects.content: A Machine Learning project to predict the 30th-day stock return using LSTM with Deep NeuralNet.

projects.title: WATER BED MAPPING
projects.content: Designing and building Remotely Operated Vehicle (ROV) for waterbed mapping of small water bodies using LiDAR.

projects.title: MUSIC INSTRUMENT DETECTION
projects.content: A Machine Learning Project to detect the instruments being played in an audio file.

projects.title: COLLEGE SELECTION GUIDE:
projects.content: A website for an optimized and conclusive search for the best college for engineering aspirants using PHP and MySQL.
